name: Longshot
description:
Longshot

is a gripping puzzle game where you play as a lost grappling hook on a quest to find its parents!

NOTE: for best performance, play Longshot in the Voxatron console, or Firefox.

Controls

z: fire
x: enter
arrows: rotate

Made for Train Jam 2019 by
-Brett Davis
-Noah Senzel
-Dan Brakeley
